name: TERMINAL (MINIGOLIATH)
description:
Welcome to the LBRNTH Program. 
We're here to help you find your perfect match!

We made this in a week of evenings for The Devolver Disc Room Game Jam.  Expect bugs as we got right to the wire. Controls:

WASD + Mouse
Left Click to Interact
Right Click to Examine, E while examining to pickup
Left Shift To Zoom
F11 to Fullscreen if it isn't

No controller support yet.

Audio Credits https://freesound.org/people/MrAuralization/packs/15891/ https://freesound.org/people/original_sound/sounds/363124/ https://freesound.org/people/edwardszakal/sounds/516362/ https://freesound.org/people/Tomlija/sounds/99029/ https://freesound.org/people/kernschall/sounds/411105/
